channel.title: [PI] changing thieving stall rewards HELP! [PI]
channel.description: Hey guys ive looked at a couple of tutorials of how to change the reward but cant seem to figure it out On my source the reward gives you ashes onyx ect. I want to change them to GP please help :| ;D

item.title: [PI] changing thieving stall rewards HELP! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Techkid Techkid
item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

[quote=“deadlyhorror, post:5, topic:528671”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=647424.msg4354289#msg4354289 date=1377205679]
Just search for the ID of one of the rewards, most likely if you’re receiving a bunch of random items like ashes and onyxes, it’s just randomly grabbing it from an array of IDs, just change it to whatever you want. Try looking for the file that handles object clicking.
[/quote]

^^^ What Null said, or you could search the IDs of the stalls :p[/quote]Sorry i mean’t to say objects.cfg file… Anyways make sure you test th object before you put it into the game as if you did something wrong the game could carsh or you could get a huge compiling error. Good luck with that stall.

Read full topic

Just search for the ID of one of the rewards, most likely if you’re receiving a bunch of random items like ashes and onyxes, it’s just randomly grabbing it from an array of IDs, just change it to whatever you want. Try looking for the file that handles object clicking.

^^^ What Null said, or you could search the IDs of the stalls
